markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Goblinblood Orphan](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=107)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Old Cheliax

</column>

Your family, whether goblin, hobgoblin, or human, died in the Goblinblood Wars. Though you were marked by these losses, you managed to survive through your own resilience and resourcefulness.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Constitution, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill, and the [Goblin Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) skill feat with Survival.
name: Goblinblood Orphan

text: Goblinblood Orphan Source World Guide pg. 106 2.0 Region Old Cheliax Your family, whether goblin, hobgoblin, or human, died in the Goblinblood Wars. Though you were marked by these losses, you managed to survive through your own resilience and resourcefulness. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Constitution, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Survival skill, and the Goblin Lore skill. You gain the Assurance skill feat with Survival.
